title: IGP Islamabad directs legal team for swift action
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP):Inspector General of Police (IGP) Islamabad Syed Ali Nasir Rizvi on Friday issued instructions to the Director of Law Tahir Kazam and the legal team, to complete the pending police cases in the high court on time.
According to the Islamabad Police spokesman (IGP) Islamabad Syed Ali Nasir Rizvi chaired an important meeting with Director of Law Tahir Kazam and the legal team.
He said that the IGP reviewed the progress reports on the pending cases involving Islamabad Police in the High Courts and consulted the legal team on various legal issues.
He directed the Director of Law and the Legal Team to complete the legal proceedings for the cases pending in the High Court promptly and to ensure the implementation of court orders.
